Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Hindering
TARGETING: Hindering
ULTIMATE ELASTIC BODY: Plasticity, Super Senses, Giant Reach: 4. // When Maker attacks, characters he targets modify defense -1 for each team ability they can use.
I'VE BEEN MAKING SOME NEW TOOLS: Outwit, Perplex. // When Maker hits, after resolutions generate a token that is copy of an Equipment-Object that's equipped to a hit opposing character. That object has [MAX 1] (for each object name) and isn't scored.
SPLITTING MYSELF APART: Shape Change. // POWER: Generate a Maker Two bystander [MAX 1].

Ultimate Elastic Body: Plasticity, Super Senses, Giant Reach: 4. // When Maker attacks, characters he targets modify defense -1 for each team ability they can use. Would a character with a wildcard team ability be -2 defense? One for the wildcard and one for the team ability it’s using?
August 1, 2020
SpooderNoob892
[QUOTE=SuperStolte;12058648]When he creates a copy of equipment where is the token placed?[/QUOTE] They are placed adjacent to the character that generated them(Maker in this case) unless otherwise specified Core Rulebook Pg 31 [QUOTE] By default, a generated game element is placed adjacent to the game element whose effect brought it into the game. [/QUOTE]
